short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the YouTube content and be distraction free!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily hide catchy YouTube videos and comments and prevent distraction. 

This extension has ergonomic CSS elements and a rich UI for great experience. Enjoy :)

Updates:
v1.2.3 (dated 27/07/2022)
  - Code is more clean and UI elements are better

v1.2.2 (dated 20/06/2022)
  - checkboxes are now custom toggle switches

v1.1.2 (dated 22/04/2022)
  - UI is more responsive now
  - comment checkbox bug fixed. Now the extension is bug-free.

v1.1.1
  - better and interactive UI

v1.1
  - added the feature of removing comments
  - bug fixes
